name: enterprising
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
good at thinking of and doing new and difficult things, especially things that will make money: The business was started by a couple of enterprising young women.enterprising of That was very enterprising of you, Vijay! Compare
unenterprising

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) good at thinking of and doing new and difficult things, esp. those that will make money: The business was started by a couple of enterprising women.
Add to word list
Add to word list
good at thinking of new business ideas or projects, and making them successful: an enterprising business/company/firm Throughout our company we need diverse, talented, creative, enterprising individuals who seize responsibility and think strategically.
